item.title: Vim for everyone!
item.description: Vim Tutorial 1.0 Installing vim The first step into the rabbit hole, here it goes! Debian/Ubuntu sudo apt in vim

item.title: How to free yourself by installing linux
item.description: This is a special blogpost since this is the guide to switch from windows to linux for new users, and the way to free them of propietary software and enjoy their freedom with free software, the software you should run!

item.title: How to customize your terminal!
item.description: This is a tutorial-type of blogpost, sorry for being away so long, but there’s a lot of blogposts coming to your way, so expect some new ones!

item.title: How to comeback and win in life
item.description: First of all, let’s talk about the definition of the word comeback shall we? Comeback: a return to a former higher rank, popularity, position, prosperity, etc.

item.title: What is GNU + Linux? Why should you care?
item.description: Let’s answer the first question first… What is linux? You use Linux everyday, without even noticing, you are using linux right now!

item.title: Why minimalism is important in your life
item.description: This is my first (and not last) blogpost talking about life advice and my opinions so just buckle up and enjoy the ride!
